post:
On Friday I saw this offer on WHT: http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1496015: "Get a Dedicated server for 1€"

I thought that this offer couldn´t be true - but what should I say - it works! :-)

Yesterday I got my Celeron dedi with a 120 GB SSD (ok - it has 26000 hours, but no errors) and a lot of IPs. And I paid just 1 Euro via Paypal.


Any ideas why they do that?

<code>
CPU model :  Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G1620 @ 2.70GHz
Number of cores : 2
CPU frequency :  1778.941 MHz
Total amount of ram : 7689 MB
Total amount of swap : 3814 MB
System uptime :   2 min,       
Download speed from CacheFly: 11.1MB/s 
Download speed from Coloat, Atlanta GA: 922KB/s 
Download speed from Softlayer, Dallas, TX: 4.19MB/s 
Download speed from Linode, Tokyo, JP: 1.92MB/s 
Download speed from i3d.net, Rotterdam, NL: 5.00MB/s
Download speed from Linode, London, UK: 6.46MB/s 
Download speed from Leaseweb, Haarlem, NL: 10.9MB/s 
Download speed from Softlayer, Singapore: 1.75MB/s 
Download speed from Softlayer, Seattle, WA: 3.14MB/s 
Download speed from Softlayer, San Jose, CA: 3.73MB/s 
Download speed from Softlayer, Washington, DC: 3.47MB/s 
I/O speed :  133 MB/s
</code>

I´m happy and of course I have nothing to do with ceuserver.net ;-)
